doc.title: Western BBQ Unique Garlic Sauce Old Airport Road Food Centre Part 8 of 9
doc.text: It/PRP was/VBD a/DT Saturday/NN night/NN and/CC I/PRP was/VBD yearning/JJ for/IN some/DT western/JJ food/NN ./. So/CC we/PRP drove/VBD past/IN Astons/NNP at/IN about/IN 8pm/NN and/CC found/VBD that/WDT there/EX was/VBD a/DT long/JJ queue/NN of/IN people/NN waiting/VBG outside/NN ./. Aiyah/JJ !!/NN Where/WRB else/RB can/MD I/PRP get/VB some/DT cheap/JJ and/CC good/JJ Western/NN Food/NN ?/. Fortunately/JJ ,/, I/PRP remembered/VB someone/NN mentioning/IN the/DT Western/NN food/NN stall/NN over/IN at/IN Old/NNP Airport/NNP Road/NNP Food/NNP Centre/NN ./. We/PRP tried/VBD the/DT pork/NN chops/NNS and/CC the/DT chicken/NN chops/NNS ./. The/DT chicken/NN chop/NN is/VBZ without/IN a/DT doubt/NN ,/, the/DT star/NN of/IN the/DT show/NN ./. The/DT other/JJ star/NN is/VBZ the/DT red/JJ colored/NN Garlic/NN Sauce/NN that/IN they/PRP serve/VBP ./. It/PRP 's/VBZ a/DT little/JJ sweet/JJ and/CC tastes/VBZ like/IN the/DT sauce/NN from/IN the/DT Baked/JJ Beans/NN but/CC mixed/VBD with/IN fried/JJ Garlic/NN ./. It/PRP went/VBD well/RB with/IN the/DT chicken/NN thigh/NN fillet/NN which/WRB was/VBD nicely/RB seasoned/JJ and/CC very/RB tender/JJ ./. The/DT pork/NN chop/NN on/IN the/DT other/JJ hand/NN was/VBD too/RB heavily/JJ beaten/VBN to/TO a/DT pulp/JJ such/NN that/IN the/DT meat/NN fibers/NN were/VBD almost/RB like/VB mince/VB ./. The/DT texture/NN was/VBD more/RB like/IN the/DT sausage/NN from/IN a/DT McMuffin/NN ./. The/DT taste/NN was/VBD alright/RB though/IN ./.
